name: Climb Souls
description:
For the

ScoreSpace Jam #9



The aim of the game is to climb as many mountains as possible.

The controls are normal FPS controls (WASD/arrow keys + mouse, space to jump).

Clicking and holding with left and right mouse buttons places a pick with the left and right hands respectively, which can be used to climb.
While holding a pick, WASD can be used to "pull" yourself around (which is important for climbing i.e. hold W to go upwards).
